entry.title: Just Say Hello!
entry.content:
Hello There! I am very happy that you reached here.

My name is Ahmed Ezz Eldin, and I am a pythonist with 3+ years coding in python, currently working at FlyingElephantLab the owner of Yaoota (one of the best startups in Egypt in 2016 according to Forbes). I code in python 8+ hr. daily doing web scraping, data cleaning and wrangling, data scale, machine learning and NLP.

I hold a BSc. in Computer Engineering with coursework in algorithms, databases, distributed systems, big data and machine learning. I also have good background in math and statistics.

I started this blog to publish bits and pieces of coding and math notes for myself that might help anyone.

Contact me at my email
